import React from "react"; import Navbar from "../Navbar"; import { FaStar } from "react-icons/fa"; import { Card } from "../Card/Card"; import { products } from "../../backend/db/products"; import { useState } from "react"; const Product = () => { const [ productListing, setProductListing ] = useState([]); console.log(productListing); useEffect(() => { (async ()=>{ const response = await axios.get('/api/products'); if(response.status === 200){ setProductListing(response.data.products); } })(); }, []) return ( <> {/* ...........aside-bar........... */}
